game.name: Fawe
game.genres: Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore Finraza, a continent devastated by The Doom of the Gods of the gods where the last inhabitants fight to survive. Fight monsters, collect resources, and carve your way to glory. Customize your character and start your adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore Finraza, a continent devastated by The Doom of the Gods of the gods where the last inhabitants fight to survive. Fight monsters, collect resources, and carve your way to glory. Customize your character and start your adventure!
